alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 1:52PM CDT until August 08 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Montgomery County in south central Alabama... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 151 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Montgomery to near Highland Home, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Meadville, Pike Road, Pine Level, Montgomery Zoo, Boylston, Hyundai Motors Of Alabama, Auburn University In Montgomery, Dublin, Woodcrest, Maxwell Air Force Base, Snowdoun, Grady, Ramer, Waugh, Lagoon Park, Hunter, Alabama State University, Hope Hull and Eastdale Mall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
